channel.title: Sidebars on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Sidebars on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: blogroll
item.description: Blogroll Blogs and feeds I read, from time to time. Go through this and there will almost always be something new to read. #a2council feed for Ann Arbor City Council Arborwiki “recent changes” Broadcastify “Top Feeds” City of Ann Arbor calendar DTE Outage Map ETrakit, City of Ann Arbor permit system Hypriot, Docker on Raspberry Pi on ARM KB6NU’s Ham Radio Blog Jason Kottke #miwx feed for Michigan weather Old News Blog, Ann Arbor District Library play.

item.title: todo
item.description: Todo Test integration (and maybe publishing too) with travis Auto-discovery for RSS feed, per http://gohugo.io/templates/rss/ Short codes for easy linking. First pass complete. Assisted synaesthesia and colorized names and phrases. (Started, with colorized but not linked names) Nicely thought through category and taxonomy pages. They have stubs now, but they need design. and it should integrate with Arborwiki. (Started.) Links from books to their corresponding URLs and ISBNs to link to AADL and Amazon pages, perhaps with Librarything data Pagination with group by date, coming in 0.
